title: Roti Pizza
instructions: Place roti on a heated pan or baking tray.
Spread pizza sauce over the roti.
Add vegetables evenly on top.
Sprinkle grated cheese, oregano, and chili flakes.
Cover with lid and cook on low heat until cheese melts, or bake at 180°C for 8–10 minutes.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Vegetable Eggless Omelette
instructions: In a bowl, mix besan, vegetables, spices, and salt.
Add water gradually to make a pourable batter.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter like a pancake.
Cook on medium flame until golden on both sides.
Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

title: Paneer Cutlet
instructions: Mix paneer, potato, vegetables, chili, and spices in a bowl.
Shape into small cutlets and coat with bread crumbs.
Shallow fry in a pan until golden and crisp on both sides.
Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

title: Broccoli Thepla
instructions: Mix flour with broccoli, spices, salt, and ginger paste.
Add water to knead into a soft dough.
Roll into thin theplas and cook on a tawa with a little oil.
Serve hot with curd or pickle.

title: Soya Chap Sandwich
ingredients: 1/2 cup soya chaap (grilled or sautéed and shredded)
instructions: Mix shredded soya chaap with mayonnaise, pepper, salt, and chaat masala.
Spread the mixture over a slice of bread and cover with another slice.
Toast on a pan or sandwich maker until golden and crisp.
Serve hot with ketchup.

title: Grilled Paneer Wrap
instructions: Marinate paneer in yogurt and spices for 15 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry paneer until golden.
Spread chutney on the tortillas.
Add lettuce, onions, and grilled paneer.
Wrap and grill the roll slightly for crispness.
Serve hot.

title: Spiced Veggie Toast
instructions: Mix mashed veggies with spices and salt.
Spread on bread slices.
Toast on a tawa with butter until golden.
Serve hot with ketchup.

title: Veggie Rice Balls
instructions: Mix rice, vegetables, chili flakes, cornflour, and salt.
Shape into small balls.
Deep or shallow fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with dip or sauce.

title: Hakka Noodle Frankie
instructions: Stir-fry capsicum and carrots in oil.
Add noodles, sauces, and salt. Mix well.
Place noodle mixture on tortillas and roll tightly.
Toast lightly on pan if desired.
Serve hot with extra sauce.

title: Masala Quinoa Upma
instructions: Rinse quinoa and set aside.
Heat oil and add mustard seeds. Let them splutter.
Add onions, green chili, carrots, and peas. Sauté well.
Add turmeric and salt. Mix in quinoa.
Pour water and cook covered for 15 minutes until quinoa is fluffy.
Serve hot with lemon wedge.

title: Paneer-Peas Roll
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden.
Add paneer, peas, cumin powder, chaat masala, and salt.
Cook for 2–3 minutes and let it cool slightly.
Place filling on roti, roll tightly, and toast if desired.
Serve warm with chutney.

title: Bajra Veg Cutlet
instructions: Mix all ingredients into a soft dough using water.
Shape into cutlets.
Shallow fry on medium flame until golden.
Serve hot with mint chutney.

title: Sattu Roll
instructions: Mix sattu with onions, chili, mustard oil, lemon juice, salt, and a little water to form filling.
Place the filling in roti, roll tightly.
Serve with pickle or chutney.

title: Beetroot Sandwich
instructions: Mix beetroot, paneer, mayonnaise, pepper, and salt.
Spread on bread slices and cover with another slice.
Toast on a tawa until golden.
Serve with ketchup.

title: Lauki Paratha
instructions: Mix all ingredients to form soft dough.
Roll into parathas.
Cook on tawa with oil/ghee until golden on both sides.
Serve with curd or pickle.

title: Sweet Corn Idli
instructions: Mix corn, chili, coriander into idli batter.
Pour into greased idli molds.
Steam for 12–15 minutes.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Pumpkin Dosa
instructions: Mix rice flour, pumpkin, and spices with water to make batter.
Spread on hot tawa and drizzle oil.
Cook till crispy and golden on both sides.
Serve with coconut chutney.

title: Green Gram Dhokla
instructions: Grind green gram, chili, and ginger to a paste.
Add lemon juice and salt. Just before steaming, mix in ENO.
Pour into greased dhokla plate and steam for 15 minutes.
Cut and serve with green chutney.

title: Banana Dosa
instructions: Mix mashed banana, rice flour, jaggery, and cardamom with water to make batter.
Spread on tawa and cook with ghee until golden on both sides.
Serve hot.

title: Paneer Poha
instructions: Rinse poha and set aside.
Heat oil, splutter mustard seeds. Add onion and chili.
Add turmeric, salt, poha, and crumbled paneer.
Mix well and cook for 2–3 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Omelette Wrap
instructions: Beat the eggs with salt, pepper, onions, tomatoes, and chili.
Heat oil in a pan, pour the mixture, and cook the omelette.
Place the omelette on the roti, roll it tightly.
Serve hot with sauce or chutney.

title: Egg Tikka Sandwich
instructions: Mix curd, spices, and salt to make tikka spread.
Apply on bread slices, add egg slices, and cover.
Toast on tawa with butter until golden.
Serve with ketchup or mint chutney.

title: Boiled Egg Cutlet
instructions: Mix all ingredients to form a dough.
Shape into cutlets and shallow fry until golden.
Serve with green chutney.

title: Egg Masala Poha
instructions: Rinse poha and keep aside.
Heat oil, splutter mustard seeds, add onions and chili.
Add turmeric, salt, and poha. Mix well.
Scramble eggs in a separate pan and mix with poha.
Cook for 2–3 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Scrambled Egg Wrap
instructions: Scramble eggs with onions, tomatoes, chili powder, and salt.
Place the scrambled egg on a roti and roll it.
Serve with chutney or ketchup.

title: Egg Tandoori Sandwich
instructions: Mix curd, tandoori masala, chili powder, and salt.
Coat egg slices in the mixture.
Place eggs between bread slices and toast with butter.
Serve hot.

title: Cheesy Egg Frankie
instructions: Scramble eggs with onions, chili flakes, and salt.
Place on wrap, add cheese, and roll tightly.
Toast on pan until cheese melts.
Serve warm.

title: Anda Chaat
instructions: Mix chopped eggs, onions, tomatoes, salt, and chaat masala.
Add green and tamarind chutneys.
Garnish with coriander and serve immediately.

title: Egg Pulao
instructions: Heat oil, splutter cumin, and sauté onions.
Add turmeric, garam masala, and rice. Mix well.
Add boiled eggs and cook for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with raita.

title: Egg Noodles Wrap
instructions: Scramble the egg with a little salt and pepper.
Mix with cooked noodles, soy sauce, and chili sauce.
Place mixture in the wrap, roll tightly.
Toast if desired and serve hot.

title: Stuffed Omelette Roti
instructions: Beat eggs with vegetables, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan, pour the egg mixture, and cook as an omelette.
Place the cooked omelette on the roti and fold it.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Deviled Egg Sandwich
instructions: Mash boiled eggs and mix with mayo, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Spread on bread slices and close to form sandwiches.
Toast with butter until golden.
Serve warm.

title: Desi Omelette Roll
instructions: Beat eggs with chopped veggies and spices.
Cook as an omelette in a pan with oil.
Place on a roti and roll tightly.
Serve with ketchup or green chutney.

title: Egg Fried Rice Balls
instructions: Mix rice, scrambled eggs, vegetables, and seasoning.
Shape into balls and shallow fry until golden.
Serve with dip or chutney.

title: Anda Sandwich with Green Chutney
instructions: Spread green chutney on bread slices.
Place boiled egg slices and season with salt and pepper.
Toast the sandwich with butter until golden.
Serve hot.

title: Spicy Egg Roll
instructions: Make a spicy omelette with eggs, onion, chili, and spices.
Place it on a roti and roll it tightly.
Serve with mint chutney.

title: Tandoori Egg Frankie
instructions: Scramble eggs with tandoori masala, chili powder, and salt.
Place on roti, top with onions and lemon juice.
Roll tightly and toast if desired.
Serve hot.

title: Egg Tikki Burger
instructions: Mix mashed eggs, potato, and spices. Shape into tikkis.
Shallow fry until golden brown.
Assemble burger with bun, lettuce, tomato, tikki, and mayo.
Serve fresh.

title: Egg Wrap with Hummus
instructions: Scramble eggs with salt and pepper.
Spread hummus on the wrap, add eggs and lettuce.
Roll tightly and serve fresh.

title: Boiled Egg Veg Sandwich
instructions: Mix eggs, veggies, mayo/yogurt, and seasoning.
Spread the mixture on bread slices.
Close sandwiches and serve or toast if desired.

title: Chicken Maggi
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and bell peppers.
Add shredded chicken and sauté for 2 minutes.
Add water and Maggi noodles with the tastemaker.
Cook until noodles are done and water is absorbed.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Keema Dosa
instructions: Heat a dosa tawa and pour a ladleful of batter to spread.
Drizzle oil and let it cook slightly.
Spread cooked chicken keema over dosa, sprinkle onions and masala.
Cook until crisp, fold, and serve.

title: Chicken Sandwich with Mayo
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with mayo, salt, and pepper.
Spread on bread slices and close to make sandwiches.
Toast with butter until golden.
Serve warm.

title: BBQ Chicken Wrap
instructions: Warm the wrap in a pan.
Place BBQ chicken, lettuce, and extra sauce on it.
Roll tightly and serve warm.

title: Chicken Biryani Cutlet
instructions: Mix biryani with mashed potato and breadcrumbs.
Shape into cutlets and shallow fry until crisp.
Serve hot with mint chutney.

title: Chicken Bhurji Toast
instructions: Spread chicken bhurji over bread slices.
Toast on a pan with butter until crisp.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.

title: Chicken Stuffed Idli
instructions: Grease idli molds and pour half batter.
Add some chicken in the center and top with more batter.
Steam for 10–12 minutes.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Spicy Chicken Quesadilla
instructions: Heat a tortilla, layer chicken and cheese.
Top with another tortilla and cook until golden on both sides.
Cut into wedges and serve.

title: Keema Egg Sandwich
instructions: Mix chicken keema, chopped egg, and mayo.
Spread on bread slices and form sandwiches.
Toast if desired and serve warm.

title: Chicken Frankie (Stuffed Style)
instructions: Warm the wrap/paratha and apply green chutney.
Add chicken filling, onions, and lemon juice.
Roll tightly and toast lightly with butter.
Serve hot.

title: Idli Sandwich
instructions: Spread green chutney on one half of each idli slice.
Add a layer of spiced mashed potato and grated carrots.
Cover with the other idli half to form a sandwich.
Serve immediately or slightly steam if needed.

title: Masala Bread Idli
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds, onions, and tomatoes.
Add turmeric and salt, sauté for 2 minutes.
Mix in curd and bread pieces, toss until soft.
Pour into greased idli molds and steam for 10 minutes.
Serve with chutney.

title: Paneer Dhokla
instructions: Mix besan, curd, turmeric, and salt to make a batter.
Fold in grated paneer.
Add ENO and pour into greased steamer plate.
Steam for 15 minutes, cut into pieces, and serve.

title: Biryani Tiffin Box
instructions: Pack hot biryani in tiffin with a boiled egg or paneer cubes.
Add a portion of raita in a separate container.
Drizzle ghee on biryani before packing (optional).

title: Roti Wrap with Chana
instructions: Place cooked chana, onions, chutney, and lemon juice on roti.
Roll tightly to make a wrap.
Optional: grill the wrap lightly and serve warm.

title: Quinoa Cutlet
instructions: Mix quinoa, mashed potato, carrots, spices, and breadcrumbs.
Shape into cutlets.
Shallow fry on both sides until golden.
Serve hot with dip.

title: Tandoori Aloo Sandwich
instructions: Mix mashed potatoes with tandoori masala and lemon juice.
Spread the filling on bread and form a sandwich.
Grill or toast with butter until crisp.
Serve with ketchup.

title: Keema Roti
instructions: Place hot keema on roti, sprinkle onions and coriander.
Fold and toast with butter.
Serve hot as a wrap or stuffed roti.

title: Eggless Omelette Dosa
instructions: Mix besan with water and add onions, tomatoes, spices.
Pour dosa batter on hot tawa and spread the besan mix over it.
Cook on both sides until crisp.
Serve with chutney.

title: Jowar Pulao
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin, turmeric, and sauté vegetables.
Add cooked jowar and salt, mix well.
Cook for 5 minutes and serve warm.

title: Paneer Paneer Frankie
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and capsicum.
Add paneer, red chili powder, chaat masala, and salt. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Warm the rotis on a pan.
Spread mayonnaise on the roti, add the paneer mixture.
Roll into a frankie and serve hot.

title: Cheese Dhokla
instructions: Mix besan, turmeric, sugar, salt, lemon juice, and water into a smooth batter.
Add ENO and mix gently.
Pour into a greased dhokla plate and steam for 10-12 minutes.
Top with grated cheese while hot and let it melt.
Cut into squares and serve.

title: Chana Idli
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds, and let them splutter.
Add onions, green chili, and sauté. Then add tomatoes and turmeric.
Add chana and cook for 2 minutes.
Add idli pieces and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

title: Moong Khichdi
instructions: Rinse dal and rice, soak for 15 minutes.
Heat ghee, add cumin seeds.
Add soaked rice and dal, turmeric, salt, and water.
Pressure cook for 3-4 whistles.
Serve hot with curd or pickle.

title: Ragi Roti Wrap
instructions: Mix ragi flour, vegetables, salt, and water to make a dough.
Roll into rotis and cook on a hot tawa using oil.
Fill with your choice of curry or stuffing.
Roll into a wrap and serve.

title: Sprout Sandwich
instructions: Mix sprouts, onion, tomato, salt, and chaat masala.
Spread the mixture on a bread slice and cover with another.
Toast the sandwich with butter or ghee until golden brown.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Aloo Tikki Wrap
instructions: Warm rotis on a pan.
Place aloo tikki on the roti, add onion slices, chutney, and ketchup.
Sprinkle salt and pepper.
Roll tightly and serve.

title: Chicken Kabab Sandwich
instructions: Mix chicken kabab with mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Spread on one bread slice, add onion and lettuce.
Top with another slice and toast if desired.
Serve warm.

title: Chicken Omelette Roll
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan, pour eggs, and cook into an omelette.
Place cooked chicken and onion on the omelette and roll.
Serve hot with sauce or chutney.

title: Moong Bean Cutlet
instructions: Mix moong beans, potato, chili, garam masala, and salt.
Shape into cutlets, coat with breadcrumbs.
Shallow fry in oil until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

title: Oats Dosa
instructions: Grind oats to a fine powder.
In a bowl, mix oats powder, rice flour, semolina, curd, cumin, green chili, and salt.
Add water to make a thin batter and rest for 10 minutes.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour the batter like a dosa.
Drizzle oil and cook until golden and crisp.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Millet Idli
instructions: Soak millet, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds for 4-6 hours.
Grind to a smooth batter and let it ferment overnight.
Add salt and mix well.
Pour into greased idli molds and steam for 10-12 minutes.
Serve with chutney or sambar.

title: Masala Poha Wrap
instructions: Rinse and soak poha for 5 minutes. Drain excess water.
Heat oil, splutter mustard seeds, sauté onions and green chili.
Add turmeric, salt, and soaked poha. Mix well.
Add coriander and turn off heat.
Place the poha in roti, roll it and serve warm.

title: Anda Cheese Toast
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a pan, pour egg mixture and lightly scramble.
Toast bread and top with egg and cheese.
Grill or toast until cheese melts.
Serve hot.

title: Paneer Frankie
instructions: Sauté paneer with spices and salt in oil.
Warm rotis, spread green chutney, add paneer and onions.
Roll tightly and serve hot.

title: Aloo Frankie
instructions: Mash potatoes with spices and sauté briefly in oil.
Place mixture in roti, top with chutney.
Roll and serve warm.

title: Stuffed Veggie Roti
instructions: Knead flour with salt, ajwain, and water into dough.
Mix veggies with salt and stuff into small dough balls.
Roll out and cook on tawa with ghee until golden.
Serve with curd or pickle.

title: Cheese Rava Dosa
instructions: Mix all ingredients except cheese and make a thin batter.
Pour on hot pan, sprinkle cheese on top.
Cook until crispy.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Mutton Cutlet
instructions: Cook mutton with spices until dry.
Mix with mashed potato, shape into cutlets.
Dip in egg, coat with breadcrumbs.
Shallow fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with sauce.

title: Egg Chutney Toast
instructions: Mix eggs with chutney, salt, and pepper.
Spread mixture on toasted buttered bread.
Serve warm or grill for extra crunch.

title: Paneer Rice Tikki
instructions: Mix cooked rice, paneer, onions, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Shape the mixture into small tikkis.
Heat oil in a pan and shallow fry the tikkis until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Corn Dhokla Sandwich
instructions: Mix corn flour, chickpea flour, turmeric powder, salt, and water to make a thick batter.
Steam the batter for 10-12 minutes to make dhokla.
Toast bread and place steamed corn dhokla between slices.
Top with grated cheese and serve.

title: Egg Fried Roti
instructions: Scramble eggs with onions, tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and salt.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the egg mixture until done.
Take roti, spread the egg mixture on top, and roll the roti.
Serve hot.

title: Spicy Paneer Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté cumin seeds.
Add paneer cubes and cook until lightly golden.
Add rice, garam masala, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Chilli Toast
instructions: Toast bread slices in a pan.
Sauté chicken with onions, bell peppers, soy sauce, and chili sauce.
Top the toasted bread with the chicken mixture.
Serve hot.

title: Egg Paratha Roll
instructions: Scramble eggs with cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Cook the scrambled eggs in a pan.
Place the scrambled eggs on parathas, roll them up.
Serve hot.

title: Egg Pulao Wrap
instructions: Scramble eggs with spices and salt.
Add cooked rice to the scrambled eggs and mix well.
Place the egg-rice mixture on a roti, roll it up.
Serve hot.

title: Sweetcorn Sandwich
instructions: Mix sweetcorn with mayonnaise, cheese, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mixture between bread slices.
Toast the sandwich with butter until golden brown.
Serve hot.

title: Masala Corn Cutlet
instructions: Mix boiled corn with mashed potatoes, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Shape the mixture into cutlets.
Coat in breadcrumbs and shallow fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Paneer Egg Frankie
instructions: Scramble eggs with onions, bell peppers, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add paneer cubes and cook until well mixed.
Place the mixture on a roti, roll it up.
Serve hot.

title: Idli Poha
instructions: Soak poha for 5 minutes and drain.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Sauté onions and green chili.
Add crumbled idli and soaked poha.
Mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.

title: Masala Chapati Roll
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onion and capsicum.
Add turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Cook until veggies soften.
Spread chutney on chapati, add filling, and roll.
Serve warm.

title: Kathi Roll with Keema
instructions: Cook onion, tomato, and spices with keema.
Sauté till keema is cooked and dry.
Place keema filling on roti and roll.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Potato Frankie
instructions: Mix spices with mashed potatoes.
Form into logs and lightly pan-fry.
Place in roti, roll it up, and serve with ketchup.

title: Prawn Rice Upma
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds.
Sauté onions and green chili, then add prawns and turmeric.
Cook until prawns are done.
Add rice and mix well.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

title: Soya Frankie
instructions: Soak and squeeze soya granules.
Cook onion and spices, add soya and sauté well.
Place filling in roti, roll and serve.

title: Keema Rice
instructions: Cook keema with onion, tomato, and spices.
Add cooked rice and mix well.
Serve hot with raita.

title: Methi Masala Thepla
instructions: Mix flour, methi, and spices to form dough.
Roll and cook on tawa with little oil.
Serve with curd or pickle.

title: Chicken Broccoli Wrap
instructions: Mix chicken, broccoli, mayo, salt, and pepper.
Place mixture on roti, roll tightly.
Grill or toast and serve.

title: Samosa Toast
instructions: Mix mashed potato with spices.
Spread on bread, cover with another slice.
Toast with butter until golden.
Serve with chutney.
